actionUnits.condition: Draft plan for manual invocation of public, parameterless methods on GvrPointerInputModule (MonoBehaviour fileID 1446812204, GUID fcd4baceb58cc40c98e500572bede6a6). Scene config: vrModeOnly=false, scrollInput.inertia=1, scrollInput.decelerationRate=0.05. Precondition: EventSystem.current exists and is this object. Note: To satisfy the framework’s Trigger interaction constraint (requires Rigidbody/Collider/EventTrigger), either attach a temporary EventTrigger component to the EventSystem for testing, or specify a valid controller/source object with a Collider/EventTrigger; otherwise this Trigger is conceptual only. Expected behavior: ShouldActivate/ShouldActivateModule evaluate activation, Process performs per-frame processing and event dispatch if a pointer and raycasters are present, Deactivate tears down module state, GetBaseEventData returns a BaseEventData instance.

MonoBehaviour (id: 723926960, GUID: e7dcc90c2e60c4011896c7f21fc1f557) in scene.unity corresponds to script GvrReticlePointer attached to GameObject fileID 1677032915. Scene config: raycastMode=Camera(0), maxReticleDistance=20, reticleSegments=20, reticleGrowthSpeed=8, reticleSortingOrder=32767. This manual trigger aims to validate UpdateDiameters behavior (material properties _InnerDiameter, _OuterDiameter, _DistanceInMeters) after Awake/Start set initial angles and MaterialComp. Note: Trigger actions require Rigidbody/Collider/EventTrigger; current object shows Has_Rigidbody=false and no Collider/EventTrigger listed—add a Collider or EventTrigger if needed.

Simulate click cycle on GvrReticlePointer to cover pointer click handlers. MonoBehaviour (id: 723926960, GUID: e7dcc90c2e60c4011896c7f21fc1f557). These are public, parameterless methods. Note: OnPointerEnter/OnPointerHover/OnPointerExit require RaycastResult/objects and are typically auto-fired by GvrPointerInputModule; they are not manually triggered here due to parameter constraints. Trigger actions require Rigidbody/Collider/EventTrigger; current object shows Has_Rigidbody=false and no Collider/EventTrigger listed—add a Collider or EventTrigger if needed.

MonoBehaviour id=1486385207 (GUID eb5dd43baba2d4dc1bab789615567e3d) on MainCamera corresponds to GvrPointerPhysicsRaycaster, derived from GvrBasePointerRaycaster. Trigger the parameterless public method GetLastRay() to retrieve the last computed pointer ray. Preconditions for meaningful coverage: EventSystem with GvrPointerInputModule present; GvrPointerInputModule.Pointer available and configured so eventCamera != null. Variations to cover branches (need scene info/child colliders): pointer null (covers early-return paths), Hybrid vs Direct/Camera modes, radius > 0 vs == 0 via pointer.CurrentPointerRadius, hit count 0 vs >0 vs == MaxRaycastHits, and delta < distanceFromStart. Note: MainCamera currently has no Rigidbody/Collider/EventTrigger; if the framework enforces Triggerable constraints, attach a temporary EventTrigger or target a child with a Collider.

MonoBehaviour component (id=1625246635, guid=4b480839cc4455844a007a3d6fa53445, script Autowalk) is enabled with serialization config: speed=2, walkWhenTriggered=false, walkWhenLookDown=true, thresholdAngle=45, freezeYPosition=false, yOffset=0.
